mapper.select: select f.f_id,f.f_name,f.f_fromcity,f.f_tocity,f.f_seatnum,book.seatnum,f.f_starttime,f.f_endtime from fb fb right join businesspoint bu on fb.b_id=bu.b_id left JOIN flight f ON f.f_id=fb.f_id left JOIN (select fb.f_id as fid,count(*) as seatnum from booking bo right join fb fb on fb.f_id=bo.f_id GROUP BY fb.b_id,fb.f_id) book on book.fid=f.f_id where bu.b_id=#{bId} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
